hamilton_tts <- hamilton_tts %>% mutate(GTA06 = as.character(GTA06))

Trips_Origin <- TTS_Dataframe.sf %>% st_drop_geometry () %>%
  transmute(GTA_06 = Zone_Origin, Trips) %>% 
  group_by(GTA_06) %>% 
  summarize(Total_Trips_Origin = sum(Trips))

Trips_Destination <- TTS_Dataframe.sf %>% st_drop_geometry () %>%
  transmute(GTA_06 = Zone_Destination, Trips) %>% 
  group_by(GTA_06) %>% summarize(Total_Trips_Destination = sum(Trips))
